entry.title: $2100 // Bright & Cozy 1 BR in Park Slope Townhouse
entry.content:
Located on the third/top floor of an owner-occupied townhouse, this beautifully renovated 400 sq. ft., light-filled apartment has high ceilings, windows facing south-east, and original wide-plank floors. Great kitchen area with island, stainless steel appliances, shaker style cabinets, and a large pantry. Many storage areas, including 3 closets. Bath with full tub/shower and pedestal sink. Interesting and thoughtful details include French doors to bedroom, bay window, exposed brick, and ceiling fans. Ideally located in a quiet and tree-lined neighborhood, it is also very close to subways (F, G, R), laundry, shopping, Prospect Park, gyms, and many restaurants and cafes.
No smoking and no dogs.
Note that apt. is unfurnished.
Please contact for appointment and more details.
No brokers please.
